dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3156580Z] Lonerates.com is stealing our copyrighted content
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringement%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Tuesday, February 20, 2007 8:10 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3156580Z] Lonerates.com is stealing our copyrighted content ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Lonerates.com is stealing our copyrighted content Added by system at Tuesday, Feb 20 2007 02:05 pm X-MailFrom: elatedclients@sellsiusrealestate.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Feb 20 14:05:05 2007 Received: (qmail 6429 invoked by alias); 20 Feb 2007 20:05:03 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 6423 invoked from network); 20 Feb 2007 20:05:02 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 20 Feb 2007 20:05:02 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 20 Feb 2007 14:05:01 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 20 Feb 2007 14:05:01 -0600 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from elatedclients@sellsiusrealestate.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HJbET-0001QE-7y for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 20 Feb 2007 14:05:01 -0600 Received: from smtp09.dc2.safesecureweb.com ([65.36.255.233]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from elatedclients@sellsiusrealestate.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HJbEE-000INH-Cy for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 20 Feb 2007 14:04:46 -0600 Received: from mail30.safesecureweb.com (skywarp.ad.safesecureweb.com [10.10.0.41]) by smtp09.dc2.safesecureweb.com (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id 7AF7D1C5700F for ; Tue, 20 Feb 2007 15:04:43 -0500 (EST) MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary=----_SmarterMail_NextPart_2772706437606045 Date: Tue, 20 Feb 2007 15:04:09 -0500 Received: from [67.126.243.98] by mail30.safesecureweb.com via HTTP; Tue, 20 Feb 2007 15:04:09 -0500 Subject: Lonerates.com is stealing our copyrighted content From: "elated clients" Reply-To: elatedclients@sellsiusrealestate.com To: CC: Message-ID: X-OriginalArrivalTime: 20 Feb 2007 20:05:01.0574 (UTC) FILETIME=[67702A60:01C7552A] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) To whom it may concern: Lonerates.com, a company that is hosting it's website with you, is stealing our blogs content - http://blog.sellsiusrealestate.com . They are also stealing 4 other bloggers content that we know. Lonesrates.com is registered under the company name Smart Semantics Corp by Tom Avery. We have emailed him and left him a voice message and have yet to receive a response. We have also contacted google because he is violating their google ad sense terms of use by stealing copyrighted content. Please advise us what you intend to do in order to remedy this matter. Thank you for your anticipated cooperation. Joseph G. Ferrara Rudolph D. Bachraty III Founders Sellsius° 425 Madison Avenue, Suite 902 New York, NY 10017 347 535 0696 office 212 644 9802 fax http://sellsiusrealestate.com/ http://blog.sellsiusrealestate.com/ If Its Real Estate Related, You Can Do It MIME element (text/html) To whom it may concern:

Lonerates.com, a company that is hosting it's website with you, is stealing our blogs content - http://blog.sellsiusrealestate.com . They are also stealing 4 other bloggers content that we know. Lonesrates.com is registered under the company name Smart Semantics Corp by Tom Avery.

We have emailed him and left him a voice message and have yet to receive a response. We have also contacted google because he is violating their google ad sense terms of use by stealing copyrighted content.

Please advise us what you intend to do in order to remedy this matter.

Thank you for your anticipated cooperation.



Joseph G. Ferrara
Rudolph D. Bachraty III
Founders
